x264.pipeline: rtspsrc timeout=5 location=__ADDR__ ! rtph264depay ! video/x-h264 ! queue ! avdec_h264 ! queue ! x264enc key-int-max=60 speed-preset=veryfast tune=zerolatency ! queue ! h264parse ! queue ! mp4mux ! filesink location="__FILENAME__"

x264.multi.pipeline: rtspsrc timeout=5 location=__ADDR__ ! rtph264depay ! video/x-h264 ! queue ! avdec_h264 ! queue ! x264enc key-int-max=60 speed-preset=veryfast tune=zerolatency ! queue ! h264parse ! queue ! splitmuxsink max-size-time=1000000000 muxer=mp4mux location="%03d-__FILENAME__"
